pd_kinematics

Valentijn Prové

27-10-2021

Loop through the different video files to create a dataframe containing the gesture and phase rates and a dataframe with the preprocessed timeseries data

We used two methods to check our preprocessing procedure. First, we created video plots that we synchronized with the original videos in ELAN. Second, we used graphs to tune our KZ filter (and reject the Butterworth filter).

Untill here, we need to run every chunk to be able to work with the data

rates <- subset(rates, File != "antwerp2a_run2")
rates <- subset(rates, File != "antwerp1b_run1")
rates <- subset(rates, File != "antwerp1b_run2")
rates <- subset(rates, File != "luik3a_run1")

mean(rates$ges.freq)
## [1] 17.35802
sd(rates$ges.freq)
## [1] 8.711069
mean(rates$descr.dur.sec)
## [1] 80.51802
rates %>%
  group_by(language) %>%
  get_summary_stats(hold.rate.min, type = "mean_sd")
## # A tibble: 2 x 5
##   language variable          n  mean    sd
##   <fct>    <chr>         <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
## 1 dutch    hold.rate.min    42  24.2  14.3
## 2 french   hold.rate.min    39  31.0  14.3
rates$PoT <- as.numeric(rates$PoT)

rates %>%
  group_by(condition) %>%
  get_summary_stats(PoT, type = "mean_sd")
## # A tibble: 2 x 5
##   condition variable     n  mean    sd
##   <fct>     <chr>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
## 1 nns       PoT         44 0.594 0.199
## 2 ns        PoT         37 0.521 0.243
summary(a <- aov(ges.rate.min ~ condition + gender + language, data = rates))
##             Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value Pr(>F)  
## condition    1   71.5   71.55   2.764  0.100  
## gender       1   35.6   35.63   1.376  0.244  
## language     1  120.6  120.56   4.658  0.034 *
## Residuals   77 1993.0   25.88                 
## ---
## Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
summary(a <- aov(hold.rate.min ~ condition + gender + language, data = rates))
##             Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value Pr(>F)  
## condition    1    433   432.7   2.245 0.1381  
## gender       1   1060  1059.6   5.498 0.0216 *
## language     1    660   660.3   3.426 0.0680 .
## Residuals   77  14840   192.7                 
## ---
## Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
summary(a <- aov(PoT ~ condition + gender + language, data = rates))
##             Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value Pr(>F)  
## condition    1  0.105 0.10540   2.271 0.1359  
## gender       1  0.196 0.19610   4.225 0.0432 *
## language     1  0.070 0.07029   1.514 0.2222  
## Residuals   77  3.574 0.04641                 
## ---
## Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
res.aov <- anova_test(
  data = rates, dv = PoT, wid =subject
  ,within = run
  ,between = c(condition, gender)
)
get_anova_table(res.aov)
## ANOVA Table (type III tests)
## 
##                 Effect DFn DFd      F     p p<.05      ges
## 1            condition   1  36  0.939 0.339       0.020000
## 2               gender   1  36  2.645 0.113       0.055000
## 3                  run   1  36 10.293 0.003     * 0.055000
## 4     condition:gender   1  36  0.038 0.846       0.000846
## 5        condition:run   1  36  0.067 0.798       0.000377
## 6           gender:run   1  36  0.095 0.760       0.000536
## 7 condition:gender:run   1  36  0.126 0.725       0.000711
res.aov <- anova_test(
  data = rates, dv = ges.rate.min, wid =subject
  ,within = run
  ,between = c(condition, gender)
)
get_anova_table(res.aov)
## ANOVA Table (type III tests)
## 
##                 Effect DFn DFd     F     p p<.05   ges

## 2               gender   1  36 0.805 0.376       0.016

## 6           gender:run   1  36 0.416 0.523       0.003
## 7 condition:gender:run   1  36 1.965 0.169       0.014
res.aov <- anova_test(
  data = rates, dv = hold.rate.min, wid =subject
  ,within = run
  ,between = c(condition, gender)
)
get_anova_table(res.aov)

ggplot(rates, aes(x=run, y=PoT, fill=language)) + 
  geom_boxplot()

mean(rates$PoT)
## [1] 0.5606379
sd(rates$PoT)
## [1] 0.2220746
rates %>%
  group_by(condition) %>%
  get_summary_stats(PoT, type = "mean_sd")
## # A tibble: 2 x 5
##   condition variable     n  mean    sd
##   <fct>     <chr>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
## 1 nns       PoT         44 0.594 0.199
## 2 ns        PoT         37 0.521 0.243
summary(a <- aov(PoT ~ condition, data = rates))
##             Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value Pr(>F)
## condition    1  0.105 0.10540   2.168  0.145
## Residuals   79  3.840 0.04861
ggplot(rates, aes(x=condition, y=PoT, fill=item)) + 
  geom_boxplot()

ggplot(rates, aes(run, PoT, shape=item)) +
  geom_point(aes(color=item)) +
  geom_line(aes(group = subject)) +
  facet_grid(.~condition) +
  theme_bw()

ggplot(rates, aes(language, ges.rate.min)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  #geom_point()
  geom_beeswarm(data = rates, aes(language, ges.rate.min, color=subject),
                dodge.width = 0.9, alpha = 0.8) +
  scale_color_manual(values = cols) +
  facet_grid(.~condition) +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  stat_summary(fun.y = mean, color = "red", geom = "line", aes(group = 1)) + 
  stat_summary(fun.y=mean, geom="point", shape = 1, color="red", size = 4)
